answers.answer: Hello,It is very difficult to make a diagnosis without examination but the various possibilities for your symptoms are paraumbilical hernia,parasthesias due to diabetes,nerve compression,TIA and hypothyroidism.A diagnostiv evaluation by a physician is necessary to rule them out.Blood tests like blood sugar levels estimation,throid profile,nerve conduction tests and MRI may  be required.Hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted in case you have any additional queries.

question: Vertically below my belly button  I  feel something sticking out uncomfortably . i also  sometimes get  a  sharp short pain in the area and  at other  times a   cold feeling, then at other times  the  sensation rises to above my belly  button to  encompass the whole lower chest area in a vertical line.The  I also  get the  sensation of  something oozing out in this lower bowel area and  also once a week i get  a  nausea feeling that comes and goes.
title: cold feeling and   oozing sensation lower  bowel
